FuncDef: This commands assigns a bi-directional forwarding (BFD) session providing heart-beat mechanism for the given VRRP/SRRP instance. There can be only one BFD session assigned to any given VRRP/SRRP instance, but there can be multiple SRRP/VRRP sessions using the same BFD session.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the service ID of the interface running BFD. Values-service-id: 1 to 214748364.
Specifies the name of the interface running BFD.
Specifies the destination address of the interface running BFD.
